### Load in the Data

```{r}
library(sf)
library(tmap)
```





```{r}
ustrade = read.csv("https://github.com/jquam15/436_Final_Project/raw/main/ustrade.csv") %>%
  rename("Deficit"="Deficit.Surplus")
head(ustrade)
```


```{r}
polygons = read_sf("countries.geojson")
head(polygons)
```

```{r}
spatial_data = merge(ustrade, polygons, by.x="Country", by.y = "ADMIN")
head(spatial_data)
```

```{r}
lakes <- lakes %>%
   group_by(id) %>%
   mutate(
     longitude = st_coordinates(geometry)[1, 1],
     latitude = st_coordinates(geometry)[1, 2]
   )
 
 tm_shape(lakes) +
   tm_polygons(col = "#00ced1")
```
